abstract.code: mix.r * src.r + mix.g * src.g + mix.b * src.b + mix.a

abstract.text: . The first three components specify the mix of source red, green, and blue channels, respectively. The fourth component serves as a constant offset and is
multipled by source alpha. Source alpha is instead carried through and applied as opacity to the colorized result. Default value corresponds to RGB luminosity.
